attributes.action: Demand the immediate resignation of the Attorney General, Baroness Scotland.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The British people demand and deserve elected officials holding office to demonstrate exemplary behaviour. The Attorney General, Baroness Scotland has failed in that respect and must resign forthwith.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
